elements.MAIN_EFFECT: [][]I am [Tough 2].  {J} You may discard a card from your Reserve. If you do: You may discard target [[Fleeting]], [[Anchored]] or [[Asleep]] Character.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []You may return a Spell from your Reserve to your hand.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: [][]I am [Tough 2].  {H} You may pay {1}. If you do: You may discard target Character with Hand Cost {4} or more.
[][]I am [Tough 1].  {H} You may discard a card from your Reserve. If you do: [Sabotage].
[][]I am [Tough 2].  {H} You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If you do: Roll a die. On a 4+, I gain 3 boosts. On a 1-3, I gain 1 boost.
[][]I am [Tough 1].  {H} []Target Character other than me gains [[Fleeting]], [[Anchored]] or [[Asleep]].
[][]I am [Tough 2].  When a card leaves your Reserve during the Afternoon — If you control one or more Landmarks: I gain 1 boost.

[][]I am [Tough 1].  {H} If you control one or more Landmarks: You may discard target Character with Hand Cost {3} or less.

[][]I am [Tough 1].  {H} Roll a die. On a 4+: You may discard target Permanent.
[][]I am [Tough 1].  {J} You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If you do: You may discard target Permanent.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []You may have target Character gain [[Fleeting]].

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: [][]I am [Tough 1].  When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — You may discard a card from your Reserve. If you do: You may have target Character gain [[Fleeting]].
